mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROJECT_INFO SET PROJECT_NAME = #{projectName,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROJECT_ADDRESS = #{projectAddress,jdbcType=OTHER}, DEVELOPMENT_COLLECTING_COMPANY = #{developmentCollectingCompany,jdbcType=OTHER}, DEVELOPMENT_COLLECTING_ACCOUNT = #{developmentCollectingAccount,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROPERTY_COLLECTING_COMPANY = #{propertyCollectingCompany,jdbcType=OTHER}, PROPERTY_COLLECTING_ACCOUNT = #{propertyCollectingAccount,jdbcType=OTHER}, WATER_PRICE = #{waterPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ELECTRICITY_PRICE = #{electricityPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SERVICE_PHONE = #{servicePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OBJECT_PHONE = #{objectPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_TIME = #{creationTime,jdbcType=DATE}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=DATE}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PK_CORP = #{pkCorp,jdbcType=CHAR}, VCODE = #{vcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VSHORTNAME = #{vshortname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PK_RESPONSECORP = #{pkResponsecorp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VINCODE = #{vincode,jdbcType=CHAR}, DECORATE_MANAGE = #{decorateManage,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PASSCARD_PLEDGE = #{passcardPledge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PASSCARD_COST = #{passcardCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DECORATE_AREA = #{decorateArea,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LESS_PLEDGE = #{lessPledge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, MORE_PLEDGE = #{morePledge,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, STARTDATE = #{startDate,jdbcType=DATE}, ENDDATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DATE}, FIRSTMNY = #{firstMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, EVERYMNY = #{everyMoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UPDATEDATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE} WHERE PK_PROJECT = #{pkProject,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT PK_PROJECT, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_ADDRESS, DEVELOPMENT_COLLECTING_COMPANY, DEVELOPMENT_COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, PROPERTY_COLLECTING_COMPANY, PROPERTY_COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, WATER_PRICE, ELECTRICITY_PRICE, SERVICE_PHONE, OBJECT_PHONE, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, STATUS, PK_CORP, VCODE, VSHORTNAME, PK_RESPONSECORP, VINCODE, DECORATE_MANAGE, PASSCARD_PLEDGE, PASSCARD_COST, DECORATE_AREA, LESS_PLEDGE, MORE_PLEDGE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FIRSTMNY, EVERYMNY, UPDATEDATE, ASTRICTSTATUS FROM T_PROJECT_INFO WHERE PK_PROJECT = #{pkProject,jdbcType=CHAR}

SELECT PK_PROJECT, PROJECT_NAME, PROJECT_ADDRESS, DEVELOPMENT_COLLECTING_COMPANY, DEVELOPMENT_COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, PROPERTY_COLLECTING_COMPANY, PROPERTY_COLLECTING_ACCOUNT, WATER_PRICE, ELECTRICITY_PRICE, SERVICE_PHONE, OBJECT_PHONE, CREATION_TIME, UPDATE_TIME, STATUS, PK_CORP, VCODE, VSHORTNAME, PK_RESPONSECORP, VINCODE, DECORATE_MANAGE, PASSCARD_PLEDGE, PASSCARD_COST, DECORATE_AREA, LESS_PLEDGE, MORE_PLEDGE, STARTDATE, ENDDATE, FIRSTMNY, EVERYMNY, UPDATEDATE FROM T_PROJECT_INFO
mapper.update: UPDATE T_PROJECT_INFO SET PK_CORP = #{pk_corp}, vcode = #{vcode}, PROJECT_NAME = #{vname}, vshortname = #{vshortname}, PK_RESPONSECORP = #{pk_responsecorp}, vincode = #{vincode} WHERE PK_PROJECT = #{pk_project}
